short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps you manage your change of address, one click at a time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At ChangeOfContact.com, we understand that moving home or business is a costly, stressful and demanding task. Add to this the anxiety about whom you should notify of your change of address and the moving process can be daunting. After all, you do not want your important mails or deliveries to be sent to your old address. 

We have a mission to solve this problem by removing it from the moving equation entirely. This extension is a step towards accomplishing this mission, but only the first one.

This extension allows you to easily record to whom you submit your postal address. This will help you remember whom you should contact about your change of address, when you move home or business office.

When you enter your postal address on a web page, if you open this extension, it will automatically prepare the information about the entity to whom you are submitting your address and you can record it by hit of a button.

In order for this to work, you need to create an account on ChangeOfContact.com and add your address(es) to your account. When you use the extension for the first time, you will be redirected to create your account, which is free.

Join us and stay tuned for more exciting updates about what we do to make your next movings free of this hassle.
